description:
1. Keep your brushes orderly and clean with this super easy and stylish leather brush holder.1. 把化妆刷整齐、洁净地放在简易又时尚的皮制包包里。

Because there's nothing more gross than a rubbing a brush on your face that has been rolling around in the bottom of your purse.用在手袋底部滚过一圈的化妆刷来刷你的脸……还有比这更恶心的吗？

2. Get super organized with an over-the-door shoe rack that's labeled to perfection.2. 给挂在门上的鞋架贴上标签，用来放化妆品，有序到完美。

This is to DIE for.太棒，我已经死了。

3. A magazine rack can be the solution to all your tangled hot tool problems.3. 杂志架可以解决吹风机电线老缠在一起的问题。

WHY didn't we think of this first?为什么我没有早点想到？

4. Add little magnet strips to the back of your makeup and create this awesome makeup magnet board.4. 在化妆品后面贴上小磁条，就可以DIY一个美妆磁铁板啦~

5. Hang some metallic jars with colorful twine to free up space on your vanity.5. 在金属罐周围缠几圈彩色的绳子（挂起来），解放你化妆盒的空间。

6. Stack and glue empty candle jars for a perfect organization system.6. 把空的蜡烛罐粘起来，用作完美的收纳系统。

Pro tip: When a candle is pretty much out of wax, freeze it over night to easily get the remaining wax out. Then use the jar for just about anything.达人贴士：蜡烛快要点完的时候，把它冻一个晚上，剩余的蜡就很容易取出了。然后这个罐子就可以放任何你想放的东西啦。

7. Give old jars a paint job and add a knob to the lid for a colorful way to keep your necessities in place.7. 给旧罐子上一层漆，在盖子上面装个把手，就能用五彩缤纷的容器装东西了。

Who knew leaving cotton swabs on display could be so stylish?谁能想到棉花签也能摆得这么潮呢？

8. Dedicate a space to your lip products with this cute copper pipe solution.8. 这种可爱的小铜管正好可以收纳你的唇膏。

9. Make a landing pad for all your most used items with these geometric trays.9. 为常用的化妆用品准备这种几何形状的盘子。

Bonus: They fit inside one another so you can decide how much storage space you need.另外，它们是可以互相叠起来的，所以你可以根据所需的大小自行组装。

10. An adhesive magnet strip can keep all your metal necessities in one, easy-to-reach place.10. 磁铁可以把所有金属的化妆工具吸在同一个地方，易于拿取。

Don't continue to be a victim of the bobby pin black hole.终于不再天天掉发夹了。

11. Make use of vertical space with this spinning storage system.11. 好好利用垂直空间，装个三层转盘吧。

12. Add some little lashes to your jars so they can be as pretty as you are.12. 给你的罐子画两条睫毛，它们就和你一样美了。

13. Create this simple speckled tray for your most used items.13. 为最常用的化妆盘点上彩色的斑点。

They look expensive, don't they?顿时就高大上了有没有？

14. Keep your perfumes together on this divine dresser tray.14. 把香水一起放在这样华丽的托盘里。

15. Paint mason jars to keep your countertop cute and in order.15. 用涂过颜料的玻璃瓶装东西，你的化妆桌会变得可爱又整洁。

Yet another use for mason jars. The possibilities are endless, my friends.玻璃瓶的另一种用途，还有无数种等着你发掘呢。

16. For when you're on-the-go, this makeup pouch will serve as the perfect organization buddy and a friendly reminder.16. 忙碌的时候，这样的化妆包既是收纳助手，又能点亮心情。

Happy girls are the prettiest, but organized girls are the happiest.快乐的女孩是最美的，但会收纳的女孩是最快乐的！

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

  • 这10个坏习惯超难改！你躺枪了吗？

  • 一韩国公园被四千中国人包了 就为啤酒炸鸡！
  • BBC模仿秀: 西总统表示不辞职
  • 视频：和各国标准美女约会 中国的简直亮瞎

title: 16个DIY小技巧 再也不会乱放化妆品啦
